reporting-org.narrative: New Zealand Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade

description.narrative: Airways carrying out assessment of the current priority of need for re-survey, procedure design, aeronautical charting and publication in Pacific Island countries. Develop indicative budget for the provision of aviation database services, procedures, charting, and publications. Prepare implementation plan.
